name: Tumblr - old post icons
description: Restores the old post icons on Tumblr. A recent update to the Dashboard introduced new icons at the top of the Dashboard - this plugin removes them, and puts the old ones back.

user.name: EdAdams
user.about: Tumblr: edwrad.tumblr.com Email: edadams101 at gmail dot com (support, technical enquiries, etc.)

additional_info: I'm willing to remove this if Tumblr request I do so. Contact me at ed_adams@live.com
